WORKSPACE.BETA_MESSAGE: The current environment is in beta. This means that may not all features work properly or some features are still missing.
WORKSPACE.ALPHA_MESSAGE: The current environment is in alpha. This means that may not all features work properly or some features are still missing.
WORKSPACE.TITLE: Workspace
WORKSPACE.NO_MATCHING_ITEMS_FOLDER: No matching elements found in folder "{{name}}"
WORKSPACE.ADD_OBJECT_SUBTITLE: Add a new file or link
WORKSPACE.LINK_INVALID_INFO: We could not find a website for this link.
WORKSPACE.LINK_DUPLICATES_INFO: We found other items that are similar to this link. Please check if this item already exists.
WORKSPACE.AUTOLOGOUT_INFO: Your session was automatically closed for your safety, because you have been inactive for at least {{ minutes }} minutes. Please login again.
WORKSPACE.LTI_INFO: Enter the corresponding data to create an external LTI-ressource.
WORKSPACE.LTI_INFO_PRIVACY:
Information on data protection:
Names and e-mail addresses of participants may be transferred to the external provider. When in doubt ask the LTI provider about data protection.
WORKSPACE.DROP_FILES: Drop files here to upload them

UPLOAD_ERROR.VIRUS_SCAN_FAILED: Error verifying the file. Please try again.
UPLOAD_ERROR.MIMETYPE_VERIFICATION: File content was not allowed or could not be verified. File was deleted.
UPLOAD_ERROR.FILETYPE_VERIFICATION: File extension could not be verified. File was deleted.

UPLOAD_EXISTS.TITLE: Existing elements
UPLOAD_EXISTS.SINGLE: "{{fileName}}" is already present at this location. Do you want to overwrite the existing element or keep both elements?
UPLOAD_EXISTS.MULTIPLE: At least one element is already present under the same name at this position. Do you want to overwrite the existing elements or keep all elements?

WORKSPACE.DELETE_MESSAGE_SINGLE: Are you sure you want to delete '{{name}}'?
WORKSPACE.DELETE_MESSAGE_PUBLISHED_COPY:
Are you sure you want to unpublish '{{name}}'?
This will remove the published copy.

Current links or handles pointing to this published element will become invalid!
WORKSPACE.DELETE_MESSAGE_COLLECTION: Are you sure you want to delete the collection '{{name}}' including all sub-collections?
WORKSPACE.DELETE_MESSAGE_FOLDER_LINK:
Are you sure you want to remove the link '{{name}}'?

The original folder and all it's contents will not be removed.
WORKSPACE.DELETE_MESSAGE_SINGLE_USAGES:
Are you sure you want to delete '{{name}}'?

The element is currently used {{usages}} times in collections or connected systems.

By deleting the element it will not longer be usable there.
WORKSPACE.DELETE_MESSAGE: Do you want to remove all selected elements?
WORKSPACE.DELETE_IMPORT_BLOCK_INFO: The element will be blocked and not re-imported in the future
WORKSPACE.UNBLOCK_MESSAGE:
Do you want to reactivate the selected elements for importing?

It may will take up to the next import run until the elements are visible in search again

SHARE.TITLE: Manage Sharing
SHARE.NO_PERMISSIONS: No explicit permissions have been stipulated for this object yet.
SHARE.USAGE_INDIRECT: This permission is generated by a collection reference and can not be removed
SHARE.TYPE_MENU_LABEL_NEW: Choose role for added persons and groups
SHARE.TYPE_COWORKER_DESCRIPTION: can view item / details page, edit item, view permissions and add elements
SHARE.TYPE_COORDINATOR_DESCRIPTION: can view item / details page, edit & delete item, view and edit permissions, add and remove elements and publish to connected systems
SHARE.TYPE_UNKNOWN_DESCRIPTION: Individual permissions have been set by admin: {{permissions}}
SHARE.PUBLISHER_TOOLTIP: Can use and publish the material in collections and attached systems (i.e. moodle)
SHARE.INHERIT_HINT: This permission is inherit from the parent folder
SHARE.LINK_ENABLED_INFO: Link sharing is active. Everyone with the link can access the material.
SHARE.PUBLISH_ENABLED: Element is published. Everyone can view and reuse this element
SHARE.PUBLISH_DOCUMENT: Release material to the public or publish
SHARE.PUBLISH_INHERIT: The access is inherit from the parent element. Disable the inherition to change access
SHARE.PUBLISH_NO_PERMISSION: You have currently no permissions to publish elements
SHARE.PUBLISH_ACTIVE_DOCUMENT: The document is made publicly available on the Internet
SHARE.PUBLISH_ACTIVE_COLLECTION: The collection is made publicly available on the Internet
SHARE.PUBLISH_ACTIVE_DIRECTORY: All documents of this folder are made publicly available on the Internet
SHARE.NO_FUZZY: Enter the full e-mail address to add users
SHARE.DOI_INFO: DOI (Digital Object Identifier) is a standardized ID for unique global identification and retrieved material
SHARE.PUBLISHING_WARNING_MESSAGE:
If you continue, the current element will be shared with all users of the system and can be accessed by everyone.

Are you sure you want to publish this element?
SHARE.ERROR_INVALID_TYPE_COMBINATION: elements of different types can't be shared in bulk

RESTRICTED_ACCESS.SECONDARY: If this option is enabled the material might not being re-distributed indirectly, e.g. via Collections. Only users having access rights on the original object can use it.
RESTRICTED_ACCESS.ADDITIONAL_PERMISSIONS_INFO: Define the permissions that will still be granted indirectly, if any.

PUBLISH.NO_LICENSE: The current material does not have an assigned license. Shared materials should have a proper license to specify whether and how the material may be reused.
PUBLISH.LICENSE_INFO: The current material is licensed under a {{license}}.
PUBLISH.LICENSE_AUTHOR: The authors should be credited as follows in the event of further use
PUBLISH.LICENSE_INFO_COPY: In the case of a published copy, the already published copy retains the previously specified license.
PUBLISH.MISSING_METADATA:
You have not yet filled in all the necessary metadata fields ({{completed}} / {{total}}).
Please fill in the metadata required for publication completely.
PUBLISH.INHERITED: The parent item/folder has already been published. Please disable inheritance or change the permissions of the parent item.
PUBLISH.NO_VERSIONS_PUBLISHED: No versions have been published yet
PUBLISH.COPY_ACTIVE: The item has already been published as a copy. The option can no longer be changed.
PUBLISH.NO_REPUBLISH: Do not publish a new version
PUBLISH.NO_REPUBLISH_DESCRIPTION: No new version is published and the existing published version remains unchanged.
PUBLISH.REPUBLISH_DESCRIPTION: A new version of this material is published, all existing versions remain as predecessors.
PUBLISH.UPDATE_METADATA_DESCRIPTION: The metadata of the existing, most recently published version is updated with the current metadata of the original.
PUBLISH.MODE_OFF_INFO: The element is not publicly accessible and can be accessed only by invited users
PUBLISH.MODE_DIRECT_INFO:
The element is released publicly. If the current element is deleted, the publication will be invalid.
If changes are made to the element, they will directly affect the publication.
PUBLISH.MODE_COPY_INFO:
A copy of the item is created. This will be stored in the central area for published content and made publicly available.
Changes to or a deletion of the original has no influence on the published copy.
Only the editorial team can subsequently control the publication. Multiple versions can be published in the same time.
PUBLISH.NO_PUBLISH_COPY_PERMISSION: You do not have permission to publish a copy.
PUBLISH.DOI_DISTINCT_INFO: A new, unique handle is created. Future versions of the object will have independent identifiers. Note that after selecting this option, no updated versions of the item can subsequently be published under the same handle
PUBLISH.DOI_UPDATE_INFO: The new version of the element will be made available under the existing, old handle address in the future. The previously published version is no longer directly accessible via the handle address
PUBLISH.LICENSE_REQUIRED: In order to publish the material you need to define a license first
PUBLISH.AUTHOR_REQUIRED: In order to publish the material you need to define the author first

BULK_MODE.TITLE: Manage permissions
BULK_MODE.EXTEND_DESCRIPTION: The selected permissions will be added to the existing permissions of the user(s)/group(s).
BULK_MODE.REPLACE_DESCRIPTION: The selected permissions will replace the existing permissions of the user(s)/group(s).

WORKSPACE.INHERIT_ACCESS_DENIED: Inherited rights can not be shown since you don't have access to the parent element
WORKSPACE.INHERIT_EMPTY:
The parent folder has currently no permissions.
Permissions will be applied as soon as they are added to the parent folder.
WORKSPACE.PERMISSION_AUTHORITY_EXISTS: The chosen user/group already has access. Check the current permissions at "Invited"
WORKSPACE.NOTIFY_INFO: The new users or groups will get an invitation notification

METADATA.RESTORE_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to change the version of this element?

COMMENT.BULK_MIGRATION: Migration step for converting oai imports to etl/bulk imports
COMMENT.REMOTE_OBJECT_INIT: Object imported from federated search source

NODE_TEMPLATE.STATUS_DESKRIPTION: After activation, new materials will receive the metadata from this template
NODE_TEMPLATE.STATUS_DISABLED: Activate the metadata template to automatically apply the metadata specified here to new content in this folder.

SHARE_LINK.TITLE: Share link
SHARE_LINK.EXPIRY_INFO: After this date the link won't be accessible for anyone
SHARE_LINK.PASSWORD_INFO: Activate to enter password for link.
SHARE_LINK.LINK_INFO: Everyone who has access to this link can download the content
SHARE_LINK.LINK_INFO_FOLDER: Everyone who has access to this link can download all contents in this folder. Sub-Folders can not be accessed.
SHARE_LINK.COPIED_CLIPBOARD_ERROR: Failed to copy link. Please mark and copy it manually

WORKFLOW.TITLE: workflow
WORKFLOW.NO_COMMENT: Please enter a comment for workflow activity.
WORKFLOW.NO_RECEIVER: Please enter a receiver for workflow activity.
WORKFLOW.NO_HISTORY: No entries for workflow activites have been made yet.
WORKFLOW.USER_NO_PERMISSION_INFO:
The user/group in charge '{{user}}' has currently no permission to access this document / these documents. Do you want to grant them coordinator permissions?

Coordinators may edit the material and grant additional users access.
WORKFLOW.BULK_WORKFLOWS_EXIST: Some of the selected documents already have an active workflow. Please edit these documents separately.

CONTRIBUTOR.TITLE: Set Contributors
CONTRIBUTOR.PERSISTENT_ID_SET: A persistent id has been set. This entry will be available to other users for reusage.
CONTRIBUTOR.EDIT_DISABLED: Editing of this entry is disabled because it uses one or more persistent identifiers. Choose "Reset fields" to re-enter all data.
CONTRIBUTOR.DELETE_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to remove {{ name }} as a contributor?

WORKSPACE.SOURCE_TARGET_IDENTICAL: The source and target of this operation are identical
WORKSPACE.TARGET_NO_DIRECTORY: The target must be a directory
WORKSPACE.TARGET_NO_WRITE_PERMISSIONS: You do not have the required permissions to move files into this directory
WORKSPACE.SOURCE_NO_WRITE_PERMISSIONS: You do not have the required permissions to move these files into another directory
WORKSPACE.FEATURE_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: This feature is currently not available

LICENSE.TITLE: Define license
LICENSE.COPYRIGHT_FREE_NAME: protected by copyright law, open access
LICENSE.COPYRIGHT_LICENSE_NAME: protected by copyright law, usage subject to license
LICENSE.CONTACT: Other users may contact me for further licensing negotiations
LICENSE.CHECKBOX_AUTHOR: I am author of the material
LICENSE.MIXED_AUTHORS_INFO:
The chosen elements have varying contributor data. In order to edit them in bulk mode you need to overwrite them.
Choose "Edit" if you want to do so.

COPYRIGHT.FREE: protected by copyright law, open access
COPYRIGHT.FREE_INFO: can be used free of charge according to copyright laws.
COPYRIGHT.LICENSE: protected by copyright law, usage subject to license
COPYRIGHT.LICENSE_INFO: Available for licensed users in accordance with the contractual conditions. No use by third parties. Attribution in accordance with common practice

CC.CC_BY_INFO: Others may share adaptations of the material as long as they name the author.
CC.CC_BY_SA_INFO: Others may share adaptations of the material as long as they name the author and share the material under the same conditions.
CC.YES_ALIKE: Yes, as long as others share alike
CC.SOURCE_URL: URL where the original work is hosted
CC.PROFILE_URL: link to the authors profile or homepage
CC.SHARE_INFO: Do you allow adaptations of your work to be shared?
CC.COMMERCIAL: Allow commercial uses of your work?
CC.COMMERCIAL_INFO: Do you allow the commercial use of your work by others?

CC0.CC0_INFO: I am the sole holder of the copyright of this object and I choose to dedicate the work to the public domain by waiving all of my rights to the work worldwide under copyright law, including all related and neighbouring rights, to the extent allowed by law.
CC0.PDM_INFO: This object is free of known restrictions covered by copyright law.

FILE_CHOOSER.NO_WRITE_PERMISSIONS: You don't have write permissions for the selected directory. Please select a different one.
FILE_CHOOSER.HOME_FOLDER_NO_PERMISSIONS: You can't store elements in this directory. Please choose a sub-directory.

CREATE_REASON.TITLE: Create not possible
CREATE_REASON.SEARCH: You're currently in a search view and can not insert elements here.
CREATE_REASON.PERMISSIONS: You don't have sufficient permissions to create elements in the current folder.
CREATE_REASON.VIRTUAL: You're inside a folder where inserting elements is not possible.
CREATE_REASON.GENERAL: Navigate to a different folder and create your elements there.

TOAST.NODE_EXISTS_IN_COLLECTION: The collection already contains the element {{name}}

TOAST.ADDED_TO_COLLECTION_MEDIA_CENTER: {{count}} element(s) have been added to the collection "{{collection}}" and are visible to members of the mediacenter
TOAST.PROPOSED_FOR_COLLECTION: {{count}} element(s) proposed for collection "{{collection}}". The elements need to be approved before they are visible.

TOAST.DUPLICATE_NAME:

TOAST.CYCLIC_NODE: A folder can not be pasted into its own
TOAST.NOT_POSSIBLE_IN_SEARCH: This operation is not possible during search
TOAST.NOT_POSSIBLE_GENERAL: Uploading is not possible in the current area
TOAST.NO_WRITE_PERMISSION: You have insufficient permissions to store items at the current location
TOAST.ONGOING_UPLOAD: An upload task is currently running. Please wait until the task has finished
TOAST.NOT_FOUND: The folder {{id}} was not found. May it has been deleted.
TOAST.ELEMENT_NOT_IN_FOLDER: Could not find the element in this folder
TOAST.CONTRIBUTOR_UPDATED: Information of contributors have been updated
TOAST.METADATA_TEMPLATE_UPDATED: Information of metadata template have been updated
TOAST.LTI_FIELDS_REQUIRED: All required fields must be filled out in order to create a lti-resource
